This template is then used by governments, non-government organisations and private institutions to evaluate the products and services offered in terms of their accessibility.

preview.alt: Two people creating ADA compliant font for a website

categoryArticles.title: Choosing the Right Font and Its Presentation: A Key to ADA Accessible Websites

An accessible font is one that is simple, clear, and legible, and will not slow the reading speed of any user, including those with visual impairments, dyslexia, and reading disorders.
